text: "Forever Your Girl" is a song by American singer Paula Abdul from her debut studio album, Forever Your Girl (1988). The song was written and produced by Oliver Leiber, with additional production by Keith "K.C." Cohen. Virgin Records released it as the album's fourth single on February 20, 1989. ==Track listings== 7-inch and cassette single :A. "Forever Your Girl" (remix) – 4:12 :B.
